评论概述: Snuggly & Warm. True to colour and size fit.
评论详情: This is actually the second of these Facitisu Women Fleece Sweatsuits we have bought. We bought a black one for my mother-in-law in April for her birthday and she loved it so much we bought a grey one for Mother's Day. She's always cold and these are now her favorite "warm suits". The photos of the grey one are true to color, the black of course is too, but grey can be funny, it can be lighter/ darker/ "greyer"  than the photos, but this is spot on. The fit is as expected, MAYBE slightly small. My mother-in-law is mostly "smalls and sometimes mediums" but we wanted this a little bigger because of the fleece to be more comfortable but not baggy. The medium was perfect. It's not bulky (which was a worry with the fleece lining), the color is clean, the fit is great, smart enough to be worn out, and not just an at-home lounge suit. It also machine washes well. We are all Very Happy! We will order more.

I'm 5'2, 216 lbs and wear 22 in pants and 2X/3X shirts with a small bust. The jacket is tight around the middle and the pants are somewhat tight around the waist (untied) when sitting. The pants do not keep you warm outside when it's chilly or cold.

I bought two of these to keep me warm before and after my outdoor swims this winter, during the pandemic. They served this  well. They absorb moisture while keeping me warm when I drive home in a wet swimsuit. After I shower at home, a dry one keeps me toasty all morning! The only thing I don’t like is that I’m bottom-heavy, so the pants are a tad snug in the hips while the top is over-large for my frame. I wish the pieces were sold separately.
